entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa steady
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %

Wind: WSW 7 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
